original: 《 錢糧交易 》國家發展過程中，有時會偶發金錢不足或糧草不足的窘境，須臨時交易周轉應急。每季交易錢糧的量會受到糧行、大糧商的影響，交易前，請先檢視一下相關附屬建物蓋好了沒？
text: "Money and Grain Transaction" In the process of national development, sometimes the dilemma of insufficient money or insufficient food and grass will occasionally occur, and temporary transaction turnover is required. The amount of money and grain traded every quarter will be affected by grain banks and major grain merchants. Before trading, please check whether the related ancillary buildings have been built?
